en.SKILL_WELCOME: Welcome to AskPlex. What would you like to do?
en.SKILL_WELCOME_REPROMPT: What would you like to do?
en.SKILL_WELCOME_PLAYBACK: Welcome to AskPlex, you were listening to {}. Would you like to resume?
en.SKILL_HELP: AskPlex connects to your Plex server, you can ask me for music by artist, album or genre, as well as specific songs and playlists
en.SKILL_DEVICE_NOT_SUPPORTED: Sorry, this device is not supported
en.PMS_CONNECTION_ERROR: Sorry, there was an error when connecting to the plex media server
en.PMS_SECTION_ERROR: Sorry, there was an error when searching for the section {}
en.PMS_SECTION_NOT_FOUND: Sorry, I can't find the section {}
en.PMS_TRACKS_SEARCH_ERROR: Sorry, there was an error when searching for music
en.PMS_TRACKS_SEARCH_EMPTY: Sorry, I can't find music in your collection
en.PMS_ARTIST_SEARCH_ERROR: Sorry, there was an error when searching for {}
en.PMS_ARTIST_SEARCH_EMPTY: Sorry, I can't find {} in your collection
en.PMS_SONG_SEARCH_ERROR: Sorry, there was an error when searching for the song {song} by {artist}
en.PMS_SONG_SEARCH_EMPTY: Sorry, I can't find the song {song} by {artist} in your collection
en.PMS_ALBUM_SEARCH_ERROR: Sorry, there was an error when searching for the album {song} by {artist}
en.PMS_ALBUM_SEARCH_EMPTY: Sorry, the album {album} by {artist} doesn't have any tracks
en.PMS_GENRE_SEARCH_ERROR: Sorry, there was an error when searching for {} music
en.PMS_GENRE_SEARCH_EMPTY: Sorry, I can't find {} music in your collection
en.PMS_PLAYLIST_SEARCH_ERROR: Sorry, there was an error when searching for the playlist {}
en.PMS_PLAYLIST_SEARCH_EMPTY: Sorry, I can't find the playlist {}

es.SKILL_WELCOME: Bienvenido a AskPlex. Qué quieres hacer?
es.SKILL_WELCOME_PLAYBACK: Bienvenido AskPlex, estabas escuchando {}. Quieres continuar?
es.SKILL_HELP: AskPlex conecta con tu servidor plex, puedes pedirme música por artista, álbum o género, así como canciones especificas y listas de reproducción
es.SKILL_EXCEPTION: Disculpa, ha ocurrido un error interno
es.SKILL_DEVICE_NOT_SUPPORTED: Disculpa, este dispositivo no está soportado
es.PMS_CONNECTION_ERROR: Disculpa, ha ocurrido un error al conectar con el servidor de medios plex
es.PMS_SECTION_ERROR: Disculpa, ha ocurrido un error al buscar la sección {}
es.PMS_TRACKS_SEARCH_ERROR: Disculpa, ha ocurrido un error al buscar música
es.PMS_TRACKS_SEARCH_EMPTY: Disculpa, no encuentro musica en tu colección
es.PMS_ARTIST_SEARCH_ERROR: Disculpa, ha ocurrido un error al buscar a {}
es.PMS_ARTIST_SEARCH_EMPTY: Disculpa, no encuentro a {} en tu colección
es.PMS_SONG_SEARCH_ERROR: Disculpa, ha ocurrido un error al buscar la canción {song} de {artist}
es.PMS_SONG_SEARCH_EMPTY: Disculpa, no encuentro la canción {song} de {artist} en tu colección
es.PMS_ALBUM_SEARCH_ERROR: Disculpa, ha ocurrido un error al buscar el álbum {album} de {artist}
es.PMS_ALBUM_SEARCH_EMPTY: Disculpa, el álbum {album} de {artist} no contiene canciones
es.PMS_GENRE_SEARCH_ERROR: Disculpa, ha ocurrido un error al buscar música {}
es.PMS_GENRE_SEARCH_EMPTY: Disculpa, no encuentro música {} en tu colección
es.PMS_PLAYLIST_SEARCH_ERROR: Disculpa, ha ocurrido un error al buscar la lista de reproducción {}
es.PMS_PLAYLIST_SEARCH_EMPTY: Disculpa, no encuentro la lista de reproducción {}
